name: The Cigar Box Discovery
description: Tony confirms his best friend is wearing a wire.
context: For months, you've suspected your close friend and soldier, 'Big Pussy' Bonpensiero, of being an FBI informant. While at his house, you found a hidden surveillance wire in a cigar box. He doesn't know you found it. You're now on a boat with him and Silvio, miles from shore. Pussy has been your friend for over 20 years. He was at your wedding. He's also been feeding information to the FBI.
prompt: You're alone on a boat with Pussy and Silvio. Pussy doesn't know you found the wire. What do you do?
stakes: If he lives, the FBI keeps getting information. If he dies, you kill your oldest friend.
